title: Please help me!!!!
body: hello everyone, I'm desperate for the prestige edition qiyana skin, I did not know that it was gonna be purchasable with worlds tokens so I foolishly spent all my tokens. Im now in the process of grinding my heart out to try and get 2000, I'm currently at 509 tokens and i've got until tuesday next week. Is there anyway that I can get tokens fast besides winning every game for the next week? Any help would awesome! P.S Thanks for an amazing season 9, and I thoroughly enjoyed my first season ever grinding ranked. Hope everyone has great last few days of the season.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Other than playing games, the only other way to get tokens is to purchase them in bundles in the shop.

1 True Damage Orb + 16 Tokens = 250RP
10 Orbs + 160 Tokens = 2500RP
30 Orbs + 480 Tokens = 7500RP
